item.title: Links from 2020-10-12
item.description: First off, hackernews brought me a link to awfice - a suite of minimal (read: one-liner data-url minimal) “office” tools. Text editor, presentations, quick drawing thingie and a spreadsheet (the spreadsheet being the most sketchy of four). Also on github. From there, I was clicking around sent ‚Äî another minimal presentations tool, this time from suckless.org. I mostly know them for their dwm window manager, which is so small you’re supposed to recompile it to change the config.
